lines.text: You've got a great body. But you've got a sick mind. But you've got a great body.

[Playing beachball with Meryl]
I know a better game than this, but we can't play it here.
With Clint, that didn't happen, with Clint...
I don't want to talk about Clint!
I have this idea. I think we are all characters in a film.
I've just had a moral victory!
Moral victories are for people lying bleeding in the mud.
Some would say nature's there as something for us to rise above.
Where did he get meat from?
I wake up, I hear your voice. I go to sleep, I hear your voice.
